1.0.1.name: connect20/Facebook_Pixel_Retargeting
1.0.1.description: The Facebook Pixel for Retargeting extension allows Facebook advertisers to build an audience from the users that visit their ecommerce store and retarget them using Facebook Ads.

suggest.magento-hackathon\/magento-composer-inst: Allows to manage this package as a dependency
